name: SSF16
title: Site-Specific Factor 16
subtitle: Xeroderma Pigmentosa
notes:
**Note 1:**  Xeroderma pigmentosa is a very rare hereditary condition characterized by extreme sensitivity to ultraviolet radiation in sunlight, with a very high risk for skin cancer and eye problems especially of the eyelids.

**Note 2:**  Code xeroderma pigmentosa as documented by the physician in the medical record.
